grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 終宵【シュウショウ】all-night long
一宵【イッショウ】one evening, one night
kun reading compounds: 待宵【まつよい】night where one waits for someone who is supposed to come, night of the 14th day of the eight month of the lunar calendar
春の宵【はるのよい】spring evening
